thread.title: New Ecotourism Tours in Sarasota
thread.title_full: New Ecotourism Tours in Sarasota - The New York Times

author: Diane Daniel
title: New Ecotourism Tours in Sarasota
text:
Bays and Birds Ecko, a new ecotourism nonprofit program based in Sarasota , Fla., is offering a series of outdoor tours to highlight the Gulf Coast’s natural and cultural diversity. The debut tour, “Inspired Sarasota Bay,” departs Oct. 25 and will take guests to bays, islands and beaches, showcasing the environmental heritage of Sarasota Bay. Additional trips this year include the Manatee River area; the Myakka River, including portions that are not generally open to the public; Gulf Coast birding; and urban wildlife viewing by bike.
